comments.comment: Hello, Please Is Customs Fees Included in the shipping and declaring the lowest price ?

Except for the United States (most regions), China, and Hong Kong, customs duties are not included in the pledged price. As we ship globally, customs fees vary depending on the policies of the destination region. Determining these details is more complex than expected, but both Edge Smart Drive and its backers are responsible for complying with these regulations. Backers may need to pay customs duties according to their local customs policies. However, rest assured that our professional logistics team will assist with proper declarations to minimize your additional costs and time expenses as much as possible.
If you have any questions, please contact us at: collins@edgesmartdrive.com.
We will start shipping in April. I'm very sorry that I didn't mark it on the page. I will ask the designer to add it later.
Hi, when do you plan to ship? There is no mention of shipping or the start of production on your schedule.
We will start shipping in April. I'm very sorry that I didn't mark it on the page. I will ask the designer to add it later.
